org.ametiste.metrics.annotations

Annotation Type Timeable


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Timeable

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      MetricsMode mode
      Defines whether method execution time should be registered in exceptional case or not.
      java.lang.String name
      Constant part of metric instance identifier.
      java.lang.String nameSuffixExpression
      Expression for changeable part of metric that depend on runtime, can be received via SpEL expression.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Constant part of metric instance identifier. Not required, if empty, expression in nameSuffixExpression() is used.
        Default:
        ""

      • nameSuffixExpression

        public abstract java.lang.String nameSuffixExpression
        Expression for changeable part of metric that depend on runtime, can be received via SpEL expression. For expression target object, arguments and returned value are accessible. For further information proceed to SpEL documentation. Optional argument, in case of absence only name() is used for metrics identifier
        Default:
        ""

      • mode

        public abstract MetricsMode mode
        Defines whether method execution time should be registered in exceptional case or not. Default is MetricsMode.ERROR_FREE that registers metric only in normal method execution. nameSuffixExpression() should be used with caution when MetricsMode.ERROR_PRONE because metric context does not include result of method execution while registers error.
        Default:
        org.ametiste.metrics.annotations.MetricsMode.ERROR_FREE
